organic.title: Gathering Logs - Riot Repair Tool (RRT) - VALORANT Support
organic.snippet: Download RRT for your operating system of choice from the links above. Run RRT (as admin for Windows). Choose the game you'd like to gather logs for and let RRT do its thing.

organic.title: New Riot Client Coming Soon
organic.snippet: All desktop Riot games will be accessible from one client, with each game having its own dedicated product page with game-specific content including the latest news and events. You'll be able to clean up your desktop and only have one Riot Client launcher where all your favorite Riot games will live!
